title: Multimedia Learning Strategies for Improving Middle School Science Textbook Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: In-service science teachers assuming learner roles, participating in education using only smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can produce a science textbook design prototype applying multimedia principles (text-image integration).
Learners can explain at least three evaluation criteria for textbook pages based on eye-tracking data.
Learners can produce textbook samples applying visual design principles (hierarchy, color emphasis, etc.) in mobile-optimized environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
